job_tasks.phrase: Research and develop solutions for audio / video data generation of humans in video
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core task of researching and developing solutions related to generative models (text-to-video) for creating synthetic humans.

job_tasks.phrase: Design methods and tools for data processing to create pre-training and fine-tuning data-sets
job_tasks.justification: This describes the essential task of preparing and managing data, specifically for pre-training and fine-tuning generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Investigate and propose new tools and infrastructure to accelerate the development of state-of-the-art models
job_tasks.justification: This involves looking into and suggesting tools and infrastructure, which is a software engineering task aimed at improving the development process of models.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and run experiments to evaluate model outcomes for model training on our large scale compute cluster (petabyte scale data, multi-node, multi-GPU model training)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly indicates the process of experimenting with and evaluating models, a core part of model development and training.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver production-ready solutions for deployment in our data and model training pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the software engineering task of creating solutions that are ready for production deployment, specifically within data and model training pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the engineering developments necessary to ship new AI models into product
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility for the engineering aspects of bringing AI models to market, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicate and collaborate across London, Amsterdam, Munich and Zurich research offices
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions communication and collaboration as a required skill for working across different geographical locations.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate and collaborate across London, Amsterdam, Munich and Zurich research offices
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need for communication and collaboration skills.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a role that involves significant tasks in both 'Core Software Engineering' (delivering production-ready solutions, engineering developments for shipping models, investigating tools/infrastructure) and 'GenAI Specialization' (researching and developing audio/video data generation, designing data processing for pre-training/fine-tuning, designing and running experiments for model training). The focus is explicitly on Generative AI (text-to-video, foundational models for humans in video), and the tasks are balanced between model development/data processing and the engineering required to deploy these models. This aligns with the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, the domain (Generative AI, text-to-video), and the types of tasks involved. It explicitly mentions both research/development of models and the engineering aspects of deployment, making the profile assignment straightforward and highly confident.
